Member Function Documentation

virtual bool sxsdk::image_exporter_interface::accepts_animation ( int  index,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Should return true if the plugin writes multiple images into a stream.

The function return false by default, and it indicates that the exporter can handle only one image per stream.

Parameters:
index The index. Used to distinguish between multiple image formats.

virtual bool sxsdk::image_exporter_interface::do_post_export ( int  index,
sxsdk::image_interface *  image,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called after exporting the image.

do_export() function gets called repeatedly while creating animation as multiple image files. do_post_export() is called once after those do_export() calls.

Parameters:
index The index. Used to distinguish between multiple image formats.
image The exported image.

Overridable. Called after exporting the multilayer image.

do_multilayerexport() function gets called repeatedly while creating animation as multiple image files. do_post_multilayer_export() is called once after those do_multilayer_export() calls.

virtual const char* sxsdk::image_exporter_interface::get_file_description ( int  index,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns the description of the file.

Until 0 is returned, index is incremented and the function is called again. After saving all the file formats be sure to return 0.

When only one file type is supported, returns the file extension if index is 0, or returns 0 if index is greater than 0.

Parameters:
index The index. Used to distinguish between multiple image formats.
virtual const char* sxsdk::image_exporter_interface::get_file_extension ( int  index,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns the file extension.

Until 0 is returned, index is incremented and the function is called again. After saving all the file extensions be sure to return 0.

When only one file type is supported, returns the file extension if index is 0, or returns 0 if index is greater than 0.

Parameters:
index The index. Used to distinguish between multiple image formats.
